metadata.Title: CVE-2020-18651 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in function ID3_Support::ID3v2Frame::getFrameValue in exempi 2.5.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via opening of crafted audio file with ID3V2 frame.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-18651` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exempi - 2.6.4-1
libexempi8 - 2.6.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exempi package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.4-1').
